full_description:
ZOJE ZJ9513 Direct Drive Industrial Sewing Machine

The ZOJE ZJ9513 Industrial Sewing Machine is an Energy Saving Direct Drive Single Needle Machine. It has a max speed of 5000 RPM and a stitching length of 0-5mm. It features lockstitch for light to medium fabrics. The ZOJE ZJ9513 comes with no warranty.
